Topic: Draw a string telephone between two students.
Evidence Statements: The student can draw two students using a device to communicate over a distance.
The student can show the string telephone clearly connecting the two students.
The student can include labels or images that indicate the device uses sound to send information.
The student can use the materials provided to show the construction of the string telephone (such as cups and string).
The student can represent how the string telephone helps the students communicate over a distance.
The student can illustrate that people depend on devices like string telephones to communicate when far apart.
